title: The Moonshine Dragon
description: Moonshine magic causes all sorts of mayhem for Patrick, after a dragon escapes from his storybook - chased by a mean knight! Patrick won't stand for any bullies in his room, but protecting the 'fire worm' isn't so easy when he gets shrunk down too. A charming Little Gem from specialist publisher Barrington Stoke.
author: Cornelia Funke
